newsitem.title: FINLAND: ESPOON SAHKO SEES IMPROVING 1997 EARNINGS.
newsitem.headline: ESPOON SAHKO SEES IMPROVING 1997 EARNINGS.

text.p: Finnish energy group Espoon Sahko Oy said on Thursday it expected full-year 1997 earnings to improve on last year.

"The group's earnings are expected to improve on the previous year unless there are any unexpected increases in energy prices or increases in other expenses," Espoon Sahko said in a statement with its January-April results.
Espoon Sahko's full-year 1996 profit before extraordinary items was 156 million markka and net sales were 809 million markka.
